item.title: Things learnt from recent preparation of 1T data for testing
item.description: Several things learnt from recent preparation of data for testing. Question the way when it takes too long to process data sed: remove last n lines In the past I always thought sed is the fastest way to manipulate data. Is it true for all the cases? I generated 1T testing data in ndjson format, however the last lines of those files are corrupted json data. I had to remove the last line.
